question.text: You are following a large articulated vehicle. It is going to turn left into a narrow road. What action should you take?

explanation.text: Lorries are larger and longer than other vehicles and this can affect their position when approaching junctions. When turning left they may move out to the right so that they don’t cut in and mount the kerb with the rear wheels.

answer.text: Move out and overtake on the right
Pass on the left as the vehicle moves out
Overtake quickly before the lorry moves out
